overview: Investment broker Edmond Sanders learns the power of hypnosis from a mysterious man who goes by the name "Carl" and uses this new skill to get what he wants in life which leads him to something he definitely didn't see coming. Soon after Mahal joins an investment firm she becomes distraught as she perceives an advance from Edmond to be an attack on her psyche. It looks to Mahal has Edmond attempted to hypnotize her. She now has to prove to her friend that she's not crazy.
tagline: The greatest trick in the world is to make someone do something, then make them think itâ€™s their idea.
title: State Of Consciousness
